content: As of this morning, Trump is back on the Colorado ballot after a Supreme Court decision. What do you think of this new move?

I have a little challenge for you this week. Try to be more optimistic this week. I know it can seem difficult with everything going on in the world, but sometimes it’s just the push you need. #SundayMotivation
This article actually has my curious. How can technology fit into our lives a little better, rather than changing everything around us? I want to know!

Have you donated yet? Help me raise money for the Dana-Farber Cancer Institute as they research treatments for blood cancers, breast cancer, ovarian cancer, pancreatic cancer, and pediatric brain cancer!
Truly an icon that was unapologetically herself. #RIPIrisApfel
Elon Musk is NOT happy with Sam Altman and OpenAI. He’s claiming that they’re breaking their contract by receiving funding from Microsoft and making money. What do you think?

Thank you Forbes for highlighting my days at T-Mobile and using my personal brand to connect with customers! Great article!
https://forbes.com/sites/rogertrapp/2024/02/29/how-a-ceos-personal-brand-can-help-connect-with-customers/?sh=4b256be65f27…

Inflation went up as expected in January and now everyone is holding their breath for the reports that are about to come in for February. I’m being hopeful! 
https://cnbc.com/2024/02/29/pce-inflation-january-2023-.html…
It’s a #LeapDay! Which means an extra day to get things done and ready for end of the first quarter. Are you ready?
Looks like we still have to talk about Bitcoin as it jumped over $60000 this morning, the highest since November 2021! It just keeps climbing!
I am thrilled to be running in the 128th Boston Marathon this year and raising $500,000  for the Dana Farber Cancer Institute while I do! Help me support this amazing organization!
We might not be seeing a merger between Kroger and Albertson’s after all. What do you think about the possible merger?
Hey @WaltLightShed, I saw your post! I listened to your podcast, and while I’m flattered, I just have to say…does being CEO mean free access to all of the parks?

Some more good news to brighten your week. A $1 billion dollar donation to the Albert Einstein College of Medicine in the Bronx and free tuition for students moving forward. I can only imagine what good this could do for the future.
Amazon officially joined the Dow today! Even if it seems small, it makes this an exciting Monday.
It’s Super Bowl Sunday! Let me know what you’re doing for the big game today. Bonus points if it involves a slow cooker!
It looks like Altman is turning his attention to chips now that he’s changed the world of AI. That is a huge amount to seek from investors, though. I wonder how he’ll do it.
Glad to hear that all of the FTX customers who lost money to Sam Bankman-Fried will be getting fully repaid!
Wishing everyone who is celebrating today a wonderful and prosperous Lunar New Year! Here’s to the Year of the Dragon!
It’s a good day for Bitcoin today, topping off at $47,000 for the first time since March 2022!
I’m so happy to see Kobe’s legacy live on. Can’t wait to see the other statues to come, especially the one of him with his daughter so their memory can continue to live on.
Looks like Google’s Bard is now Gemini. I wonder what inspired the change.
Some #ThursdayThoughts because I’ve been running around lately. When life gets busy, remember to take a minute and just appreciate where you are. Sometimes we forget how amazing it is.
Another day, yet another new streaming service. At least it will put a bunch of sports into one place, but do we really need another platform?
Ouch! To lose to “none of these candidates.” That’s got to hurt Haley’s campaign. Wonder where they can go from there.

I wonder if X is going to follow suit and identify AI-generated images. 
https://cnbc.com/2024/02/06/meta-to-identify-more-ai-generated-images-ahead-of-upcoming-elections.html…
Heartbreaking to see such a great artist taken from us so soon because of cancer. RIP Toby Keith
I know we’re going to see a lot of this type of legislation this year that balances out what AI should and shouldn’t be used for. While I welcome it, I also hope it doesn’t

Here's some #MondayMotivation to kick off your work week. There are a lot of uncertainties in business and finance- just look at the stocks! However, you can’t let that hold you back from taking a chance. After all, you never know what it will lead you to. I know I didn’t!
It’s Grammy night! Excited to see some of the performances, especially from some of the legends like Billy Joel and Joni Mitchell! I have to ask, what were your favorite songs this year?
The US Olympic Marathon Trials were this morning down in Orlando! Congrats to all of the runners who competed, but especially those that will be representing us this summer in Paris!
Fantastic closing numbers in the stock market yesterday! Just keeps going higher! Excited to see what happens next.
Wow! What is going on over at Sports Illustrated this morning? A revoked license AND laying off almost their entire staff?!
You’ve heard my opinion on AI affecting jobs…I wonder what ChatGPT has to say. Ha! Here’s what you need to know!
Excited to see what Meta comes up with but I have to ask…what happens to the Metaverse Zuck’s been talking about for years?
Not a good time of the year for EVs, I guess. I’m sure this could affect the market moving forward, but I’m curious about how much.
I just did a trial run of the new @Nike Alphafly3. I did it on a treadmill but even there I would give it at least a 9 out of 10. Has anybody else tried them yet?

The jobless claims report this week is looking good! Lowest reading in over a year!
https://cnbc.com/2024/01/18/weekly-jobless-claims-post-lowest-reading-since-september-2022.html…
We might be getting those rate cuts sooner rather than later. Excited!
It looks like some of the people who left X during Elon’s takeover are starting to come back.

Elon Musk is looking to have more control over Tesla, wanting 25% of voting power! All so he can have more control over AI and robotics development. Makes me curious about what he has planned for Tesla’s future.
Iowa Caucus was yesterday with Trump in the lead.  Looks like election season is officially here!
“We must use time creatively, in the knowledge that the time is always ripe to do right.” - Martin Luther King Jr #MLKDay
What’s happening in markets going in to this coming week? Inflation data is in and Earnings season has started… let’s review
Feels like today is more the first day of the year instead of yesterday as we shake off the holidays. What are your goals for the new year?
Everyone is holding their breath for a new Epstein Client list to come out this week. Certainly, a dramatic way to start the new year.
Hope everyone had a fantastic first day of the new year!

Happy New Year from BED! I wish you all a very healthy, happy and peaceful new year, and I hope you have and find and give love and happiness to others and help as many people as you can. Do more In 24, especially as it relates to helping and loving others. I will!
Thanks for all of the birthday wishes for @christinalegere! We had a blast celebrating! Well...more like a smash!
Everyone help me wish a very happy birthday to my wonderful daughter, @christinalegere!
What a way to end the year! Gives me a little hope for the 2024 market.
Congrats to Francoise Bettencourt to be the first woman to reach $100 Billion!
Happy last Friday of 2023! What work are you getting done to set you up for the start of the new year next week? I know I’m getting ready for a great weekend with my girls.

Jobless claims increased toward the end of the year. Unfortunately, no surprise due to the several layoffs we’ve seen, but I’m hoping as the new year starts, we’ll begin to see those claims lower again.
All eyes are on the S&P 500 this morning as the index inched closer to an all-time high. Definitely an exciting time to be watching the markets.
You know me, ever the optimist and that will continue into 2024. I like to think that things will get a little better for our economy in the coming months.
Donald Trump WILL remain on the ballot in Michigan for the coming election season. I’m sure stories like this are only going to ramp up as we enter the new year and a new presidential race.
Crypto has been seeing a big comeback the past few weeks and I am thrilled to see it! Now that some of the legal drama has calmed down, we’ll see a new surge in 2024.

*jingle jingle* Do you hear that? It sounds like…#JingleBellJohn!
I’m THRILLED to announce I will start clearing lists and checking them twice next week as we countdown to Christmas! The first winners will be announced on 12.18!

Hasbro has become the latest company to announce layoffs, saying they’ve noticed a decline in toy sales. I don’t look at the toy shelf often anymore (except for Batman), but have you all noticed a slowdown?

The Core CPI numbers are out and things look like they are slowing down. This is a promising sign for consumers in the new year.
https://cnbc.com/2023/12/12/cpi-inflation-report-november-2023.html…
Well, Alex Jones came back onto X this weekend. How are we feeling? Excited? Nervous? Curious?

Still over here in Boston and I need to know…where’s the best place to get a cup of coffee? Because I have a lot to do today!
#MondayMotivation

I love seeing technology revolutionize how we treat life-threatening diseases like Sickle Cell! While it’s not perfect, it’s certainly a step in the right direction. Now, let’s find a cure for cancer!

As we get further into the holiday season and closer to the new year, everyone is talking about the next big thing customers will want. Do yourself a favor. Ask your customers what they want! Don’t just follow the trends. #SundayInspiration
The EU officially announced they have their first set of AI regulations yesterday. However, they won’t take effect until 2025. Glad to see the world accepting that we are definitely in the AI Age!
So now there’s another subscription tier for X: Premium+! How many levels does that make now? I am curious about Grok, though. Are you going to try it?
Hunter Biden has officially been indicted on federal tax charges in California. This comes after a plea deal and charges earlier this year. 2023 has not been kind to Hunter.
The jobs report is out and the market is looking strong! Unemployment is declining and we saw many more jobs added to the market than was expected. A great way to head into the end of the year.

New jobs report coming out tomorrow! I'm not looking for much change, with hiring typically slowing down toward the end of the year. Who knows, though, maybe the workers returning from their strikes will cause a surprise surge. Interested to see. #ThursdayThoughts
What did everyone think of the GOP debate last night? With just a few more months til the primaries, we’re starting to get down to the wire. At least the stage was a lot less crowded.
Congratulations to @sama for being Time Magazine’s CEO of the Year! Well deserved after an incredible year of innovation with OpenAI.

“I think the greater responsibility, in terms of morality, is where leadership begins.”
RIP Norman Lear
Not a bad view for a Tuesday! #TuesdayVibes
Taking a minute out of my holiday to wish you all a wonderful Thanksgiving today!
With all the chaos and drama the past few days between Binance, OpenAI, and even here on X, I could not be happier for the holiday tomorrow. #WednesdayThoughts
What a chaotic week at OpenAI! Sam Altman is back in, but I'm curious about how that first day back will go after everything.

Oh, thank God! Glad to know Snoop hasn’t changed. It's a great way to launch his partnership with Solo Stove, though.
https://cnn.com/2023/11/20/entertainment/snoop-explains-going-smokeless/index.html…
And this is why I’m such a big believer in the transition process. If you’ve transitioned out of a company, you must trust the new leadership and move on to the next opportunity.
Some #MondayMotivation for you all this week: Remember, it’s a holiday week! Work a bit today and tomorrow, then enjoy the break.
Microsoft wasted no time in getting Sam Altman and the many workers of OpenAI who left with him onto their payroll. This will definitely shift the AI game over the next few months.
No matter what you think about climate change, I think it’s vital to at least prepare for how business will change with the environment. Always plan ahead!
Just in time for Thanksgiving!

In a surprising turn of events, Sam Altman is out as CEO at OpenAI after practically being the face of the AI movement for the last year. Will be watching this company and Altman to see what come next.
Getting ready for a relaxing weekend before the hectic holiday week next week. What are you all doing? #FridayVibes
Snoop is giving up smoking weed? I hope everything is okay and it’s the best move for him and his family.
Well, I’m not using eye drops for a while. As everything gets cooler and dryer, it’s important for all consumers to know about this recall.

A new era of Fox News has officially begun! Curious to see how Lachlan Murdoch differs from his father and the changes he’ll bring to the network.
https://cnn.com/2023/11/15/media/rupert-murdoch-steps-down-reliable-sources/index.html…
Being Batman myself, I’m thrilled to see Batkid all grown up and healthy!

What is going on over on Capital Hill? Senators picking fights with Teamsters! Are we in middle school?
https://cbsnews.com/news/markwayne-mullin-fight-teamsters-president-sean-obrien-senate-hearing/#:~:text=Washington%20%E2%80%94%20Republican%20Sen.%20Markwayne%20Mullin,a%20Senate%20hearing%20on%20Tuesday….
I think it’s too early for Christmas  decorations what do you think?
Thanks to AI, we have one last Beatles song in the world. It sounds fantastic!! Will have to add it to my running playlist.
It’s Marathon weekend here in New York! Is anyone running this year? I’ll see you near the finish line.

In honor of coming @nycmarathon here is a #TBT to the year that my leg completely cramped and froze with a half mile left to go and I had to limp to the finish line with a good time but an even greater pain

A big merger is looking to shake up the theme park industry, with Six Flags and Cedar Fair coming together in an $8 Billion deal. Excited to see what this new this will merger could create.  
https://cnn.com/2023/11/02/investing/six-flags-cedar-fair-merging/index.html…
Not going to let this chilly weather keep me from training. Who else is planning to run in the #BostonMarathon2024?!
Andy can we talk? @AndyUnanue @aua_equity
So, what is this app supposed to be now? Social media? Finance? Apparently, Elon wants it to be EVERYTHING!
Only two months left in 2023! No matter what your goals for the end of the year, start pushing towards those goals now before the holidays get in your way.
Wishing all of you a wonderful, spooky, and safe #Halloween night!
This could possibly be a good way to combat misinformation, but only time will tell if it actually works.
Is anyone else excited to see what Apple has in store for us at the #AppleEvent tonight?
I’ve been trying to wrap my head around this all weekend and it still doesn’t feel real. He was definitely a friend to all of us. RIP Matthew Perry
Some #SundayMotivation for you all today: learn from what scares you because it will teach you more than you think, especially when it comes to doing business.
There are so many new subscriptions on this app, that I’m beginning to lose track. Which one am I supposed to be on again?
Who else is watching the World Series? Who are you cheering on?

I think we can all rest easier knowing we’re safe from this guy.
https://independent.co.uk/news/world/americas/maine-shooting-shooter-caught-dead-robert-card-latest-b2437512.html…
Who has that Spooky #FridayFeeling on this Halloween weekend? What are you all up to?

What are you up to, Joe? There might be a chance that new AI regulation coming from the White House could also impact the crypto game. I want to see these regulations before I make any judgments, but I will keep a close eye on it.
Who on here is receiving shares of ad revenue here on X as part of premium? I want to hear your thoughts and experience with it.
What kind of apps would you want in your car? Because GM is starting to develop them.
Nothing better than a fall run on country roads … agree?
Are you watching the eclipse? I’m on the East Coast, so I might not get a good shot. Send me some pictures, West Coast!
Wishing everyone a wonderful, restful, and safe weekend.

Yes! Happy to see healthcare workers getting a deal and getting back to work.
https://cnn.com/2023/10/13/business/kaiser-permanente-strike-deal-reached/index.html…

Good news for those of you collecting Social Security. Benefits are officially going up!  Bad news: it probably not as much as you hoped. 
https://cnn.com/2023/10/12/politics/social-security-increase-benefits-cola/index.html…

CPI numbers are in and prices are up. A little worried as we get closer to the holiday shopping season but hopefully things won’t get too much higher for the basic consumer. 
https://cnbc.com/2023/10/12/cpi-september-2023.html…

Keeping a close eye on this OOFOS competitor. Birkenstocks made a huge splash on the Stock Exchange today. 
https://cnn.com/2023/10/10/business/nightcap-birkenstock/index.html…

So, we got the inflation data this morning. A little higher than expected, but still staying positive as we get closer to the end of the year. #WednesdayThought
https://cnbc.com/2023/10/11/ppi-september2023-.html…
Today is World Mental Health Day! While it’s important to be dedicated to your work and find success, none of it is worth your mental health. Make sure to also take care of yourself.

I’ve seen a lot about the Israeli conflict the past few days from both sides. I want to be clear that no matter the side of this conflict, there’s no doubt this is a horrible, ongoing tragedy. Will be watching this conflict closely as it continues.

AI is a top investment priority for CEOs across the tech space. No surprise there. Excited to see what they come up with though, outside of voice changers and prompts. How can AI be used to empower the way we work?
In case you missed it, there are two government holidays happening today. I’m curious about which one you’re celebrating. Indigenous People’s Day, Columbus Day, or is it just another bank holiday?

“Thoughts and dreams don’t die. Belief in freedom and justice does not perish with imprisonment, torture or even death and tyranny do not prevail over freedom.” #SundayMotivation from the 2023 Noble Peace Prize Winner, Narges Mohammadi
Congratulations to Kelvin Kiptum for setting the world record in the marathon today at the Chicago marathon in a time of 2:00:35, yes 2 hours and 35 seconds with a second half of 59:47!!!
Getting ready for another great week ahead!
Writers are going back to work in Hollywood after nearly 150 days on strike! Now, eyes turn to SAG/AFTRA.

I haven’t heard the term net neutrality in a while, but it’s back in the news as the FCC cracks down on internet providers slowing down access to certain sites. 
https://cnn.com/2023/09/26/tech/fcc-net-neutrality-internet-providers/index.html…

Some #TuesdayThoughts. I shared this on Threads yesterday. Felt I should share it here, too. Know your market…as in, understand your customer. When in doubt, ask your customers what they want and then give it to them. Don’t be shocked if they love it! Then repeat.
Wishing all of my Jewish friends a blessed Yom Kippur today!
Anyone else excited to see Usher at next year’s halftime show? Going to be a great show!

Have you gotten the iPhone 15 yet? Or are you waiting for the next one?
https://cnn.com/2023/09/22/tech/apple-iphone-15-release/index.html…
I mean…is anyone really calling it X or are you still calling it Twitter?
I’m Just curious….am I the only person that loves to run  in the rain?  (…and yes, right through puddles )
It’s the first day of fall! What is your favorite part of the season? I personally can’t wait for it to cool off.

This strike looks like it’s going to get a lot bigger before it gets better. 
https://cnn.com/2023/09/22/business/auto-workers-strike-expands/index.html…
TikTok might be teaming up with Google’s search engine to improve its capabilities in the future. Is it just me or does it feel a lot less likely that TikTok will ever be fully banned?

We’re getting a report about Justice Thomas every few weeks now. What are the next steps? When is something going to be done about this? 
https://cnn.com/videos/politics/2023/09/22/propublica-justice-clarence-thomas-secret-events-koch-network-justin-elliot-cnntm-vpx.cnn…

Hope to hear some good news in the next few days so Hollywood can get back to work! 
https://cnn.com/2023/09/20/media/hollywood-studios-writers-resume-negotiations/index.html…

This is not something I thought I’d see today. Robert Murdoch, the infamous chairman of Fox News, will soon be retiring. How will this shape the future of Fox News? 
https://cnbc.com/2023/09/21/rupert-murdoch-steps-down-as-chairman-of-fox-and-news-corp.html…
Come on Fedwatchers and Equity markets! Really? Every time… excitement, predictable Fed action and comments, market decline…and gradual “it wasn’t so bad” to follow…. Why every time :)
I guess people like to know what’s in their food and they are definitely making noise about it.

The Fed has announced the results of their latest discussion today and it looks like we’re having a reprieve this month when it comes to the interest rates. No big hikes right now as we head into Q4. Hoping it stays that way.
Wishing The Boss a speedy recovery!
First the cut back on oil production and now this strike! Not looking good for holiday gas prices. ​
It’s almost the end of the week! What are your biggest business takeaways so far for September?
More and more people are joining the gig economy, but there’s no real protection for them. Curious to see if the risk is worth it or if someone is going to come along to fill the gap.
Happy Birthday, Google!
Not the best start for the day at the stock market, but we’re only halfway through the week. I'm hoping to see more stocks going up by the end of the week.
This strike in Hollywood is only going to get worse for the big production companies. Warner/Discovery alone is seeing a big hit despite the Barbie summer. Where’s the deal?
Keep an eye on the gas pumps over the next few weeks. Looking like oil production is going to be cut once again.
Wishing you all a restful, fun Labor Day today! What are you up to today?

This is why I’m always happy to do #JohnClearMyList every year! This year, I bought over 650 books, 200 packs of pencils & pens, 140 games, and 150 packs of snacks. Plus, some tech, classroom decor, and LOTS of stickers. Help our teachers! 
https://cnn.com/2023/09/02/business/teachers-back-to-school-spending/index.html…
Wishing you all a restful, fun Labor Day today! What are you up to today?
How much would you pay not to have ads on your social media?
With all of these lists the past month, I haven’t really checked in on you all lately. How are you all doing here on X?
DeSantis, strikes, and now Spectrum. Looks like Disney has problems on multiple fronts.
What a great way to kick off the month and the coming fall season!
Sad to see this one. RIP Jimmy Buffett
I like this idea! Definitely helpful if you forget your wallet. Would you use a digital ID?

Can you believe we’re going into week 4 of #JohnClearMyList? Let’s clear the lists for some amazing teachers!! Congrats to John, a 6-12 Theater& Choir Teacher from Seaford, DE, and Sara, a High School History Teacher from Milledgeville, GA!! I’m clearing your lists!
It’s getting a lot hard to block the people you don’t want to hear from on this app. How do you feel about this new development?

Great start to the weekend! Let’s clear the lists for some amazing teachers!! Congrats to Lynn, a Special Education Teacher from RoundLake Heights, IL, and Ashley, an Emotional Impairment Teacher from Pellston, MI!! I’m clearing your lists! #JohnClearMyList

After some controversy surrounding Target earlier in the second quarter, Walmart was bounding past the other competitors. Interested to see how this continues throughout the year as we get closer to the holidays. 
https://cnn.com/2023/08/17/investing/walmart-q2-earnings/index.html…
Brace yourselves, CA! Praying everyone stays safe from this coming storm.

Happy Friday!! Let’s clear the lists for some amazing teachers!! Congrats to Amanda, a 3rd Grade Teacher from Ripon,WI, and Beth, a High School Science Teacher from Holbrook, AZ near Navajo Nation!! I’m clearing your lists!

This deal could be huge for retail in the South as Winn Dixie slowly fades away from the popular Aldi brand. Those of you in the South, how do you feel about this transition? 
https://cnn.com/2023/08/16/investing/aldi-buys-winn-dixie/index.html…

So many lists, so little time! Can you believe we’re over halfway through #JohnClearMyList?! Congrats to Alondra, a Special Education Teacher from Keizer, OR, and Sarah, a 4th Grade Teacher from Urbandale, IA!! I’m clearing your lists!
It was a BIG summer for movies this year, but can it be sustained?  What do you think?

Halfway through week 3, and just get more excited with every list! Let’s clear some more lists! Congrats to Hannah, a 4th Grade Teacher from Grundy, VA, and Erika, a 1st Grade Teacher from Lidgerwood, ND!! I’m clearing your lists! #JohnClearMyList

It’s the end of our first week of #JohnClearMyList and it’s been a great one! To round it out, congrats to Kasey, a 4th Grade ELA Teacher from Albany, NY and Drew, a 4th Grade Teacher from Buffalo, NY!! I’m clearing your lists!

So…it’s Bed, Bath, and Beyond…but it’s not Bed, Bath, and Beyond because it’s Overstock. Does this confuse all of you as consumers? 
https://cnn.com/2023/08/01/business/bed-bath-beyond-relaunch/index.html…

It’s about time they got back to the table! Hoping both parties come to a good deal that gets artists paid and back to work. 
https://cnn.com/2023/08/02/business/writers-strike-negotiations-resume/index.html…

We’re almost at the end of our first week of #JohnClearMyList! Congrats to Andrea, a 5th Grade Teacher from Kansas City, KS and Jose, a High School Spanish Teacher from Victorville, CA!! I’m clearing your lists!
Someone is pretending to be me, taking advantage of our teachers. I want to make one thing clear: I will not contact you unless you have won and I would NEVER ask you to fill out a registration form.
Halfway through our first week and we have more winners! Congrats to Salinda, a PE Teacher from West Carroll, IL and Alexis, an 8th Grade Math Teacher from Philadelphia, PA!! I’m clearing your lists!
We’re off to a great start for #JohnClearMyList! Just remember: lists need to be $1000 or less, follow me, and be sure to use #JohnClearMyList! Plus, be sure to let me know where you’re from!
Paul Reubens brought joy to so many people and was truly an icon in pop culture. His light and humor will be missed. RIP Paul Reubens.
It’s Day 2 of #JohnClearMyList!! Congrats to Courtney in Portsmouth, VA and Careen in Sumter, SC!! I’m clearing your lists!
It’s Day 1 of #JohnClearMyList!! Congrats to our first winners Robin in Deland, FL and Dennise in San Antonio, TX!! I’m clearing your lists!

In honor of #JohnClearMyList, I wanted to share one memorable saying or piece of advice I received from a teacher when young…”Good, better, best, never let it rest, until your good is better, and your better best.”
Writers are not happy with AI companies using their work without their permission. Now, they’re going to court. This could be the start of a lot of regulation around how AI learns. What do you think?
Did anyone else watch the match between Novak Djokovic and Carlos Alcaraz yesterday? What a match! Congrats to Carlos Alcaraz on winning his first Wimbledon title!
What’s Wall Street looking at this week to continue market momentum?
It’s hard to believe cell phones are old enough to have a whole exhibit.
Call me curious today. Those of you that are still holding on tight to Twitter after all of the excitement this week, what keeps you here? What keeps you loyal to Twitter?
I believe the key to success is Good energy, and no negativity….(Turn it up and get some )

Anyone else keeping a close eye on crypto?  Looking forward to see how things go! 
https://cnn.com/2023/07/14/business/crypto-sec-ripple-xrp/index.html…
Now that I’m back, I’m starting to plan some exciting things for the 2nd half of the year. I wonder what it could be.  What do you have planned? Let me know!
Who else is loving that #FridayFeeling? And By Friday Feeling, I mean having two cups of coffee before noon. Here’s to the weekend!
If there’s one thing we’ve learned this summer, it’s that workers don’t feel heard. Look at Hollywood! Not only are writers on strike, but now actors, too! I’m on the side of listening to workers.
You didn’t think I was completely gone from Twitter now that Threads is here, did you? How are you all doing, Twitter?
It’s a long road back to running after injury.. so, I got up early, put on my best  clothes, and went to running trail in @centralparknyc !!… (ok I brought my coffee and walked but it’s a start )
And it's live! Exploring Meta's new Threads app. Who else is online?
Wishing you all a wonderful and safe 4th!!
Truly insightful analysis of the emerging AI “voices” by @JeffSonnenfeld  .. read on and comment!
Every now and then, it’s good to take a break. I’m logging off for a bit to rest and relax. See you later!

Google is in some more trouble this week, this time in Europe. The EU accused Google of antitrust violations regarding ad tech. What do you think? Do they have a case? 
https://cnn.com/2023/06/14/tech/google-eu-antitrust-ad-tech/index.html…
No! Not the Instant Pot!
What a beautiful Wednesday! What have you been most excited about this week so far?
Accenture is the latest company to make a huge investment in AI, investing $3 billion over three years into its data and AI practices.
This a nice sight to see! Inflations continued to go down in May, a great sign for our economy and consumers across the country.
